actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on formulated products containing mixtures of the active ingredient 2-chloro-n-[[(4-methoxy-6-methyl-1,3,5-triazin-2yl)amino]carbonyl] benzenesulfonamide and application adjuvants.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on formulated products containing mixtures of the active ingredient 2-chloro-n-[[(4-methoxy-6-methyl-1,3,5-triazin-2yl)amino]carbonyl] benzenesulfonamide and application adjuvants.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on formulated products containing mixtures of the active ingredient 2-chloro-n-[[(4-methoxy-6-methyl-1,3,5-triazin-2yl)amino]carbonyl] benzenesulfonamide and application adjuvants.

A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on formulated products containing mixtures of the active ingredient 2-chloro-n-[[(4-methoxy-6-methyl-1,3,5-triazin-2yl)amino]carbonyl] benzenesulfonamide and application adjuvants.
